info.name: SUMO - highlight clickable sections in edit view
info.description: Add a triangle indicating the section in edit view is clickable to show/hide some content. A proposal solution for https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1459873.
info.additionalInfo: If you find any issues with this style, please comment in https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1459873.
